channel.description: I'm complaining about the login. The /login part is fine, but when I put in my forum password, it says make sure to use forum password. GRRRRR.

item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytN9N5tCMgg[/youtube]

item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:4, topic:445963”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=548823.msg4023600#msg4023600 date=1340186579]
Do you need a complaint form?

We at moparcraft always put our customers first, and will launch a full investigation upon your report. We will issue an official response on our stance on the matter within 2-3 working days.

All the best,
Matty
[/quote]

lol

We regret to inform you that the part after /login is broken.
Our devs are doing all they can to resolve this issue before christmas.[/quote]
lol, funny. but in all seriousness, aren’t we told not to troll the members who ask question, no matter how stupid the question or member is, and just simply answer it?
the password for the server is…TADA! YOUR PASSWORD TO LOGIN ON HERE!

Read full topic
